column1: ake ubone ngwana waka ya mosehlana hakalekale sebina kannete ya modimo ha lesahlatswe ngwana eo
ore hoya bona batswetse ba tlokweng
mphe moriana wane wa likhapa o botlolong enngwe ketlotlotsa ausi wahae
sebina mphe omong o teng ka mono
uabona he jwale tjena uqoqe hofelwa
ha eseele wena ailoeqholotsa pele tlosa kharafu eo libuseng hara lebala kengotse thabang local court
sebina ake ushebe mabokoseng aka tlasa bethe ake utlise buka e teng ya sekhowa batlophetla
kere di ka moo hodima tafole
